name: com.smartbear/smartbear-mcp
description: MCP server for AI access to SmartBear tools, including BugSnag, Reflect, API Hub, PactFlow.

environment_variables.name: BUGSNAG_AUTH_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: BugSnag auth token. Leave empty to disable BugSnag tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/bugsnag-integration

environment_variables.name: BUGSNAG_PROJECT_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: BugSnag project API key (optional; narrows interactions to a single project). Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/bugsnag-integration

environment_variables.name: REFLECT_API_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: Reflect API token. Leave empty to disable Reflect tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/test-hub-integration

environment_variables.name: API_HUB_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API Hub API key. Leave empty to disable API Hub tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/api-hub-integration

environment_variables.name: PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL
environment_variables.description: PactFlow/Pact Broker base URL. Leave empty to disable Pact tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/contract-testing-with-pactflow

environment_variables.name: PACT_BROKER_USERNAME
environment_variables.description: Pact Broker username (alternative to token). Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/contract-testing-with-pactflow

environment_variables.name: PACT_BROKER_PASSWORD
environment_variables.description: Pact Broker password (alternative to token). Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/contract-testing-with-pactflow
